price: 5. Kuwase ku dadaala ka hor imaanshaha Aayadahayaga2 - kuwaa waxay leeyihiin cadaab daran oo xun.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مِّن رِّجۡزٍ أَلِيمٞ
footnotes: 2. Inay qiimo dhimaan Aayadahaa oo ugu jeejeesaan si aan loo raacin Nabiga s.c.w.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna saʿaw fī āyātinā muʿājizīna ulāika lahum ʿadhābun min rij'zin alīmun
